text: Catherine Elizabeth "Kate" Pierson (born April 27, 1948) is an American musician and singer. She was one of the members of The B-52s. She does rock and new wave music. She also sang with other bands. Pierson was born in Weehawken, New Jersey. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from New Jersey Category:American rock musicians Category:New wave singers
title: Kate Pierson
